subject: [R] intersect more than two sets
body:
Hi,
I searched the archives and did not find a good solution to that.

assume I have 10 sets and I want to have the common character elements of them.

how could i do that?

-- 
Weiwei Shi, Ph.D
Research Scientist
GeneGO, Inc.
